original_title: 妻の女友達に狙われた僕は中出しを拒めない 夕季ちとせ
overview: "Surprise! It's been a long time, Mr. Koji. Do you have Kaori?" While my wife, Kaori, was returning to her parents' house with her children, Chitose, a friend of her wife, a beautiful woman, came to make a surprise visit. When she tells him that Koji is just away, her radiant smile quickly fades. Chitose slumps her shoulders with deep regret. Feeling sorry for her dejection, Koji invites her into the house, saying, "Would you like to have a cup of tea?"
title: I Can't Deny My Wife's Best Friend A Creampie Chitose Yuki
